question: Hi, all.  I am a 41 yr old female who has had diabetes for 27 years.  I believe I may be having trouble with some muscle problems in my left thigh.  I also have areas of burning and pins and needles in both legs.  My leg (sometimes both) can be so bothersome that it makes walking/going up stairs very difficult.  I am seeing a neurologist, but wondered if anyone else has concerns like these?
title: myopathy and nerve pain
